snippet: A scientist who posed as a board member of a conservative organization to gain access to its confidential information has been reinstated as president of the Pacific Institute.
abstract: Peter Gleick, scientist who posed as a board member of a conservative organization Heartland Institute to gain access to its confidential information, is reinstated as president of the Pacific Institute, the environmental research organization he founded.
